mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_POST ( title, content, user_no, board_type, created_at, last_modified_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{user_no}, 'SNS', sysdate(), sysdate() )
INSERT INTO B_COMMENT ( content, post_no, user_no, created_at ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{post_no}, #{user_no}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: UPDATE B_POST SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, last_modified_at = sysdate() WHERE seq = #{boardId};
UPDATE B_POST SET state = 'N' WHERE seq = #{boardId};
mapper.select: SELECT B_COMMENT.seq AS comment_no, B_COMMENT.content AS content, DATE_FORMAT(B_COMMENT.created_at, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_at, M_USER.id AS user_id FROM B_COMMENT JOIN M_USER ON B_COMMENT.user_no = M_USER.seq WHERE B_COMMENT.post_no = #{boardId}
